question: Q: What do you mean by valid NUST email ID?
answer: A: Email ID provided to you by your department when you joined NUST. It will have your department name after @ for example 14bscsefatima@seecs.edu.pk

question: Q: I am not a student/teacher/vendor at NUST. Can I join NUCoins?
answer: A: No you can't. This service is currently available only for NUSTIANS.

question: Q: I work/study at NUST but I haven't been given a NUST email ID. How do I access NUCoins?
answer: A: Please contact the NUST administration and get your NUST email ID.

question: Q: I am at NUST temporarily and don't have a NUST email ID, how do I login?
answer: A: Please get some sort of proof that you're a NUSTIAN and contact Team Jalapeno, we'll add your personal email ID to our system after the completion of our verification process.

question: Q: How many types of accounts are there?
answer: There are three types of accounts. Student account for current students only. Admin account for NUST staff and teachers. Vendor account for cafe staff

question: Q: Why is my transaction INVALID?
answer: A: An admin can only transfer NUCOins to a student account. A student can transfer to a student or a vendor account. Please make sure your transaction falls in one of the mentioned categories.

question: Q: How do I get NUCoins transferred to CASH?
answer: A: If you're a vendor or a student , simply click on the 'Withdraw' option on the navbar and after filling the details, a receipt will be generated. Use it to get cash from the conversion booth.

question: Q: I have generated my receipt. Where is the conversion booth?
answer: A: You'll find it at each cafe as well as inside your department in the lobby or in the common area.

question: Q: How do I buy an event ticket using NUCoins?
answer: A: Click on the events page and select 'buy' button on the event of your choice. Fill in the details, print the receipt generated. The receipt is NOT your ticket. you need to show it to the concerned person and exchange it for your receipt.

question: Q: What is the benefit of buying a ticket through NUCoins?
answer: A: After transfer is complete and receipt has been generated, no one else can take your seat in the workshop/event. So you can confirm your ticket by paying from home.

question: Q: Who will receive the ticket money?
answer: A: Every event has a student representative for collecting the money for the event. Your NUCoins will be automatically transferred to the concerned person.

question: Q: Can I update my password?
answer: A: Yes. Select the 'Profile' option from the navbar. You can update your password on that page.

question: Q:Specified user hasn't created account yet. Explain?
answer: A: The email ID entered is in our list of valid emails but the User hasn't registered on our website. Ask the user to register and you'll be able to transfer after that

question: Q: Can anyone else see my profile?
answer: A: No, only you can see your profile.

question: Q: Does transaction history only store Account to account transfer of NUCoins?
answer: A: It stores information regarding all your transactions including transfer, receiving, withdrawal, recharge as well as ticket buying.

question: Q: Can i buy multiple tickets of one event from my account?
answer: A: Yes you can. This feature has been added so you can buy an event tickets for your friends too. Also the electronic ticket is just a proof of payment. You need to get the actual ticket in your name from the representatives.
